buildCommand.description: The neu build command will execute this command before generating the app bundle, so you can generate bundled version of frontend library code.

devCommand.description: This command will run with the neu run command to start the frontend library's development server.

devUrl.description: The URL of the frontend library's development server.

initCommand.description: A command that gets executed after downloading a host app template with the neu create command.

patchFile.description: Path of the HTML entry file for the frontend library.

waitTimeout.description: The time in milliseconds to wait for the frontend library's development server to start. By default, the max time is 20 seconds.
